text: Muli hua nia mee aanei ne hai, hunu dagi o Israel gu lloomoi ga helekai mai bolo nia daangada mo digau hai mee dabu mo digau Levi gu hagalee noho gee, gu unihagi hua gi digau Ammon, Moab, Egypt, Canaan, Hittite, Perizzite, Jebus, mo Amor. Digaula gu haihai hua nadau hai huaidu ala e haihai go nnenua aanei.
